003package choreo;
004
005import static edu.wpi.first.util.ErrorMessages.requireNonNullParam;
006
007import choreo.auto.AutoChooser;
008import choreo.auto.AutoFactory;
009import choreo.auto.AutoFactory.AutoBindings;
010import choreo.auto.AutoLoop;
011import choreo.auto.AutoTrajectory;
012import choreo.trajectory.DifferentialSample;
013import choreo.trajectory.EventMarker;
014import choreo.trajectory.ProjectFile;
015import choreo.trajectory.SwerveSample;
016import choreo.trajectory.Trajectory;
017import choreo.trajectory.TrajectorySample;
018import com.google.gson.Gson;
019import com.google.gson.JsonObject;
020import com.google.gson.JsonSyntaxException;
021import edu.wpi.first.math.geometry.Pose2d;
022import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.DriverStation;
023import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.Filesystem;
024import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Command;
025import edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command.Subsystem;
026import java.io.BufferedReader;
027import java.io.File;
028import java.io.FileNotFoundException;
029import java.io.FileReader;
030import java.io.IOException;
031import java.util.HashMap;
032import java.util.List;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.Optional;
035import java.util.function.BiConsumer;
036import java.util.function.BooleanSupplier;
037import java.util.function.Supplier;
038
039/** Utilities to load and follow Choreo Trajectories */
040public final class Choreo {
041  private static final Gson GSON = new Gson();
042  private static final String TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION = ".traj";
043  private static final String SPEC_VERSION = "v2025.0.0";
044
045  private static File CHOREO_DIR = new File(Filesystem.getDeployDirectory(), "choreo");
046
047  private static Optional<ProjectFile> LAZY_PROJECT_FILE = Optional.empty();
048
049  /** This should only be used for unit testing. */
050  static void setChoreoDir(File choreoDir) {
051    CHOREO_DIR = choreoDir;
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * Gets the project file from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects a .chor file to be placed in
056   * src/main/deploy/choreo.
057   *
058   * <p>The result is cached after the first call.
059   *
060   * @return the project file
061   */
062  public static ProjectFile getProjectFile() {
063    if (LAZY_PROJECT_FILE.isPresent()) {
064      return LAZY_PROJECT_FILE.get();
065    }
066    try {
067      // find the first file that ends with a .chor extension
068      File[] projectFiles = CHOREO_DIR.listFiles((dir, name) -> name.endsWith(".chor"));
069      if (projectFiles.length == 0) {
070        throw new RuntimeException("Could not find project file in deploy directory");
071      } else if (projectFiles.length > 1) {
072        throw new RuntimeException("Found multiple project files in deploy directory");
073      }
074      BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(projectFiles[0]));
075      String str = reader.lines().reduce("", (a, b) -> a + b);
076      reader.close();
077      JsonObject json = GSON.fromJson(str, JsonObject.class);
078      String version = json.get("version").getAsString();
079      if (!SPEC_VERSION.equals(version)) {
080        throw new RuntimeException(
081            ".chor project file: Wrong version " + version + ". Expected " + SPEC_VERSION);
082      }
083      LAZY_PROJECT_FILE = Optional.of(GSON.fromJson(str, ProjectFile.class));
084    } catch (JsonSyntaxException ex) {
085      throw new RuntimeException("Could not parse project file", ex);
086    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
087      throw new RuntimeException("Could not find project file", ex);
088    } catch (IOException ex) {
089      throw new RuntimeException("Could not find project file", ex);
090    }
091    return LAZY_PROJECT_FILE.get();
092  }
093
094  /**
095   * This interface exists as a type alias. A ControlFunction has a signature of ({@link Pose2d},
096   * {@link SampleType}).
097   *
098   * @param <SampleType> DifferentialSample or SwerveSample.
099   */
100  public interface ControlFunction<SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>>
101      extends BiConsumer<Pose2d, SampleType> {}
102
103  /**
104   * This interface exists as a type alias. A TrajectoryLogger has a signature of ({@link
105   * Trajectory}, {@link Boolean})-&gt;void, where the function consumes a trajectory and a boolean
106   * indicating whether the trajectory is starting or finishing.
107   *
108   * @param <SampleType> DifferentialSample or SwerveSample.
109   */
110  public interface TrajectoryLogger<SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>>
111      extends BiConsumer<Trajectory<SampleType>, Boolean> {}
112
113  /** Default constructor. */
114  private Choreo() {
115    throw new UnsupportedOperationException("This is a utility class!");
116  }
117
118  /**
119   * Load a trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files to be placed in
120   * src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
121   *
122   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
123   * @param trajectoryName The path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
124   *     directory, file extension is optional.
125   * @return The loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
126   */
127  @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
128  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>>
129      Optional<Trajectory<SampleType>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName) {
130    requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "Choreo.loadTrajectory");
131
132    if (trajectoryName.endsWith(TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION)) {
133      trajectoryName =
134          trajectoryName.substring(0, trajectoryName.length() - TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION.length());
135    }
136    File trajectoryFile = new File(CHOREO_DIR, trajectoryName + TRAJECTORY_FILE_EXTENSION);
137    try {
138      var reader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(trajectoryFile));
139      String str = reader.lines().reduce("", (a, b) -> a + b);
140      reader.close();
141      Trajectory<SampleType> trajectory =
142          (Trajectory<SampleType>) loadTrajectoryString(str, getProjectFile());
143      return Optional.of(trajectory);
144    } catch (FileNotFoundException ex) {
145      DriverStation.reportError("Could not find trajectory file: " + trajectoryFile, false);
146    } catch (JsonSyntaxException ex) {
147      DriverStation.reportError("Could not parse trajectory file: " + trajectoryFile, false);
148    } catch (Exception ex) {
149      DriverStation.reportError(ex.getMessage(), ex.getStackTrace());
150    }
151    return Optional.empty();
152  }
153
154  /**
155   * Load a trajectory from a string.
156   *
157   * @param trajectoryJsonString The JSON string.
158   * @param trajectoryName The path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
159   *     directory, file extension is optional.
160   * @return The loaded trajectory, or `empty std::optional` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
161   */
162  static Trajectory<? extends TrajectorySample<?>> loadTrajectoryString(
163      String trajectoryJsonString, ProjectFile projectFile) {
164    JsonObject wholeTrajectory = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryJsonString, JsonObject.class);
165    String name = wholeTrajectory.get("name").getAsString();
166    String version = wholeTrajectory.get("version").getAsString();
167    if (!SPEC_VERSION.equals(version)) {
168      throw new RuntimeException(
169          name + ".traj: Wrong version: " + version + ". Expected " + SPEC_VERSION);
170    }
171    EventMarker[] events = GSON.fromJson(wholeTrajectory.get("events"), EventMarker[].class);
172    JsonObject trajectoryObj = wholeTrajectory.getAsJsonObject("trajectory");
173    Integer[] splits = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("splits"), Integer[].class);
174    if (projectFile.type.equals("Swerve")) {
175      SwerveSample[] samples = GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("samples"), SwerveSample[].class);
176      return new Trajectory<SwerveSample>(name, List.of(samples), List.of(splits), List.of(events));
177    } else if (projectFile.type.equals("Differential")) {
178      DifferentialSample[] sampleArray =
179          GSON.fromJson(trajectoryObj.get("samples"), DifferentialSample[].class);
180      return new Trajectory<DifferentialSample>(
181          name, List.of(sampleArray), List.of(splits), List.of(events));
182    } else {
183      throw new RuntimeException("Unknown project type: " + projectFile.type);
184    }
185  }
186
187  /**
188   * A utility for caching loaded trajectories. This allows for loading trajectories only once, and
189   * then reusing them.
190   */
191  public static class TrajectoryCache {
192    private final Map<String, Trajectory<?>> cache;
193
194    /** Creates a new TrajectoryCache with a normal {@link HashMap} as the cache. */
195    public TrajectoryCache() {
196      cache = new HashMap<>();
197    }
198
199    /**
200     * Creates a new TrajectoryCache with a custom cache.
201     *
202     * <p>this could be useful if you want to use a concurrent map or a map with a maximum size.
203     *
204     * @param cache The cache to use.
205     */
206    public TrajectoryCache(Map<String, Trajectory<?>> cache) {
207      requireNonNullParam(cache, "cache", "TrajectoryCache.<init>");
208      this.cache = cache;
209    }
210
211    /**
212     * Load a trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files to be placed in
213     * src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
214     *
215     * <p>This method will cache the loaded trajectory and reused it if it is requested again.
216     *
217     * @param trajectoryName the path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
218     *     directory, file extension is optional.
219     * @return the loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
220     * @see Choreo#loadTrajectory(String)
221     */
222    public Optional<? extends Trajectory<?>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName) {
223      requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "TrajectoryCache.loadTrajectory");
224      if (cache.containsKey(trajectoryName)) {
225        return Optional.of(cache.get(trajectoryName));
226      } else {
227        return Choreo.loadTrajectory(trajectoryName)
228            .map(
229                trajectory -> {
230                  cache.put(trajectoryName, trajectory);
231                  return trajectory;
232                });
233      }
234    }
235
236    /**
237     * Load a section of a split trajectory from the deploy directory. Choreolib expects .traj files
238     * to be placed in src/main/deploy/choreo/[trajectoryName].traj.
239     *
240     * <p>This method will cache the loaded trajectory and reused it if it is requested again. The
241     * trajectory that is split off of will also be cached.
242     *
243     * @param trajectoryName the path name in Choreo, which matches the file name in the deploy
244     *     directory, file extension is optional.
245     * @param splitIndex the index of the split trajectory to load
246     * @return the loaded trajectory, or `Optional.empty()` if the trajectory could not be loaded.
247     * @see Choreo#loadTrajectory(String)
248     */
249    public Optional<? extends Trajectory<?>> loadTrajectory(String trajectoryName, int splitIndex) {
250      requireNonNullParam(trajectoryName, "trajectoryName", "TrajectoryCache.loadTrajectory");
251      // make the key something that could never possibly be a valid trajectory name
252      String key = trajectoryName + ".:." + splitIndex;
253      if (cache.containsKey(key)) {
254        return Optional.of(cache.get(key));
255      } else if (cache.containsKey(trajectoryName)) {
256        return cache
257            .get(trajectoryName)
258            .getSplit(splitIndex)
259            .map(
260                trajectory -> {
261                  cache.put(key, trajectory);
262                  return trajectory;
263                });
264      } else {
265        return Choreo.loadTrajectory(trajectoryName)
266            .flatMap(
267                trajectory -> {
268                  cache.put(trajectoryName, trajectory);
269                  return trajectory
270                      .getSplit(splitIndex)
271                      .map(
272                          split -> {
273                            cache.put(key, split);
274                            return split;
275                          });
276                });
277      }
278    }
279
280    /** Clear the cache. */
281    public void clear() {
282      cache.clear();
283    }
284  }
285
286  /**
287   * Create a factory that can be used to create {@link AutoLoop} and {@link AutoTrajectory}.
288   *
289   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
290   * @param driveSubsystem The drive {@link Subsystem} to require for {@link AutoTrajectory} {@link
291   *     Command}s.
292   * @param poseSupplier A function that returns the current field-relative {@link Pose2d} of the
293   *     robot.
294   * @param controller A {@link ControlFunction} to follow the current {@link Trajectory}&lt;{@link
295   *     SampleType}&gt;.
296   * @param mirrorTrajectory If this returns true, the path will be mirrored to the opposite side,
297   *     while keeping the same coordinate system origin. This will be called every loop during the
298   *     command.
299   * @param bindings Universal trajectory event bindings.
300   * @return An {@link AutoFactory} that can be used to create {@link AutoLoop} and {@link
301   *     AutoTrajectory}.
302   * @see AutoChooser using this factory with AutoChooser to generate auto routines.
303   */
304  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>> AutoFactory createAutoFactory(
305      Subsystem driveSubsystem,
306      Supplier<Pose2d> poseSupplier,
307      ControlFunction<SampleType> controller,
308      BooleanSupplier mirrorTrajectory,
309      AutoBindings bindings) {
310    return new AutoFactory(
311        requireNonNullParam(poseSupplier, "poseSupplier", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
312        requireNonNullParam(controller, "controller", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
313        requireNonNullParam(mirrorTrajectory, "mirrorTrajectory", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
314        requireNonNullParam(driveSubsystem, "driveSubsystem", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
315        requireNonNullParam(bindings, "bindings", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
316        Optional.empty());
317  }
318
319  /**
320   * Create a factory that can be used to create {@link AutoLoop} and {@link AutoTrajectory}.
321   *
322   * @param <SampleType> The type of samples in the trajectory.
323   * @param driveSubsystem The drive {@link Subsystem} to require for {@link AutoTrajectory} {@link
324   *     Command}s.
325   * @param poseSupplier A function that returns the current field-relative {@link Pose2d} of the
326   *     robot.
327   * @param controller A {@link ControlFunction} to follow the current {@link Trajectory}&lt;{@link
328   *     SampleType}&gt;.
329   * @param mirrorTrajectory If this returns true, the path will be mirrored to the opposite side,
330   *     while keeping the same coordinate system origin. This will be called every loop during the
331   *     command.
332   * @param bindings Universal trajectory event bindings.
333   * @param trajectoryLogger A {@link TrajectoryLogger} to log {@link Trajectory} as they start and
334   *     finish.
335   * @return An {@link AutoFactory} that can be used to create {@link AutoLoop} and {@link
336   *     AutoTrajectory}.
337   * @see AutoChooser using this factory with AutoChooser to generate auto routines.
338   */
339  public static <SampleType extends TrajectorySample<SampleType>> AutoFactory createAutoFactory(
340      Subsystem driveSubsystem,
341      Supplier<Pose2d> poseSupplier,
342      ControlFunction<SampleType> controller,
343      BooleanSupplier mirrorTrajectory,
344      AutoBindings bindings,
345      TrajectoryLogger<SampleType> trajectoryLogger) {
346    return new AutoFactory(
347        requireNonNullParam(poseSupplier, "poseSupplier", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
348        requireNonNullParam(controller, "controller", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
349        requireNonNullParam(mirrorTrajectory, "mirrorTrajectory", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
350        requireNonNullParam(driveSubsystem, "driveSubsystem", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
351        requireNonNullParam(bindings, "bindings", "Choreo.createAutoFactory"),
352        Optional.of(trajectoryLogger));
353  }
354}
